page.title: 11BANK MANAGER
page.content: The NatWest Branch opened in 1971 and the piggy bank opened in December 1983.The branch has about Â£50,000 stored in the actual bank itself.In the whole world the NatWest branches have about 90,000 staff in the banks but in this branch there are only 12 staff.Customers come in for money from their account,they draw out foreign currency,they come in for insurance and to discuss wills.The manager lends money out to people and he controlls the accounts.The sub-manager takes over from the manager when he is ill or he has to go to a place on business,and he keeps everything in check.The workers keep totals of the days work and they control the closing of accounts
